name: Rudolf the Red Rose Slain Deer
name_original: Rudolf the Red Rose Slain Deer
description:
This is an entry for RPGMaker.net's Jingle Jangle Jam 2021.

Introduction

All of Santa's reindeer are dead.

Luckily for him, mercenary arcane magic practicing reindeers are ten a penny.
Rudolf the Red, local necroprancer, has been drafted in last minute to revive the fallen deer and once more bring Christmas joy to the world.

This is a challenging, story-driven form of popular arcade game Snake, created in RPG Maker MV for RMN's 2021 Christmas game jam.

It is also a live high scores game, and those scores will soon be viewable right here on RMN, using the same system you might have seen in such games as Sneks and Demons, Frogge or Blocks Blocks Brevolution.

Story and RPG-style elements are ultimately skippable, should you wish to just trot right into the arcade game.

Credits
Graphics: RPG Makers XP and MV, Franuka (licensed), Jason Perry
Plugins: SomeRandomDude, Galv, Jackell Dragon, Yami, dbchest
Audio: Myuu, Defrini (Free Music Archive), Rohanpp786, HoBoTrails

Hall of the Mountain King by Kevin MacLeod | http://incompetech.com
Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com
